creator: sebb@apache.org
text: When HTMLParser is used to parse embedded resources of the form it adds the image to the list of URLs twice. This is because the is parsed as part of the (Link) tag as well as being parsed as a part of the nested parsing of composite tags, such as the link tag. The fix is to ignore the nested image when processing link tags.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1179657&view=rev
Log:
Bug 51980 - HtmlParserHTMLParser double-counts images used in links
